description: Creates a new connection. In Amazon DataZone, a connection enables you to connect your resources (domains, projects, and environments) to external resources and services.

parameters.name: awsLocation
parameters.description: The location where the connection is created. accessRole (string) --- The access role of a connection. awsAccountId (string) --- The account ID of a connection. awsRegion (string) --- The Region of a connection. iamConnectionId (string) --- The IAM connection ID of a connection.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A unique, case-sensitive identifier that is provided to ensure the idempotency of the request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: domainIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the domain where the connection is created.

parameters.name: environmentIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the environment where the connection is created.
